name: Hand of Fate (itch)
description:
JUMPSCARE WARNING!!!!!!

Controls: Move the mouse to aim, left click to turn on and off your flashlight.

Goal: Collect batteries and survive as many rounds as possible. Make sure to flash the shadowy hands that crawl towards you, but don't flash the monster!

Programmed by Nathaniel Mejia

Art by Katey B

Music by Maxwell Davidson
